direct_enhancements.reason: The isValid method depends on the getValidator method to retrieve the appropriate validator for the IBAN code.
The isValid method in the RegexValidator class performs a similar validation operation using regular expressions, which can be used to enhance test cases for the IBAN validation.
Both methods involve setting or validating a format or pattern, with similar control flows and exception handling.
The validate method in the RegexValidator class can be used to substitute the validation logic in the isValid method, providing alternative ways to validate the IBAN code.
The match method in the RegexValidator class accesses and processes the input string similarly to how the isValid method does, making it a candidate for enhancing test cases.
